trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Lewiston
There were no other sightings in Lewiston on or around September 6th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting in my hot tub looking up and noted three lights traveling from northeast to southwest. The lights had the appearance of satellites, which I often see. However, I have never seen three lights traveling in a triangle pattern such as these. The object or objects appeared to be very high in the sky and moving steadily in what appeared to be a straight line. There was an airshow in the vicinity (Brunswick Naval Air Station) the previous weekend but I heard no engine noises and whatever these objects were, they did not have the appearance of aircraft. I see a lot of jets pass overhead but sooner or later you hear the noise and see the navigation lights. These lights appeared to be much higher and looked, as I noted, like satellites - just star-like specks of light moving at a steady, even pace. The formation, traveling with the "point" of the triangle leading the way, drifted till it reached the southwest horizon and then just disappeared over the horizon.
Summary: three lights with the appearance of satellites traveling in a triangle formation
